mods.abstract: DETAINED in the jail of the parish of St. John the Baptist, the runaway boy calling himself FLEMING and saying to belong to Mr Chs Coxe, of bayou Lafourche. The said boy of about 50 years, measures 5 feet 3 inches, speaks english and french. The owner thereof is hereby requested to claim said boy, according to law. Parish of St John the Baptist, June 28th 1855. NUMA TREPAGNIER. Deputy Sheriff.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
